Package tools.numbers

Class BigDecimalTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • tools.numbers.ToolNumber
        • tools.numbers.ToolNumberOperationAdapter
          • tools.numbers.BigDecimalTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, PublicCloneable
    @Deprecated
public class BigDecimalTool
extends ToolNumberOperationAdapter
    Deprecated.
    Old class, and needs to be refactored.
    Wrapper for the BigDecimal class to use it as a toolNumber.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
